rules_text: Sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
